item.title: Deploying Private Amazon EKS on AWS Fargate Cluster with EFS
item.description: Because Kubernetes has transformed the way organisations do application deployments and databases are integral part of the applications and can’t be left behind… In a previous article, we discussed the setup for Fully Private EKS on Fargate Cluster fulfilling security requirements of certain regulated industries.

item.title: Setup a Fully Private Amazon EKS on AWS Fargate Cluster
item.description: Regulated industries needs to host their workloads in most secure ways and fully private EKS on Fargate cluster attempts to solve this problem. Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
